altTitles.ja: 宇宙船レッドシャーク

description.en:
A masterpiece science fiction manga depicting the adventures of a young astronaut.

Kenji, who passed the space pilot exam with excellent grades, boards the spacecraft Red Shark and grows under the guidance of Captain Jack Lowrey. After Captain Lorei dies in the line of duty, Kenji takes over as captain of the Red Shark and sets off on an adventure to explore the mysteries of the universe.

biography.en: a Japanese manga artist born in Suma Ward of Kobe City in Hyōgo Prefecture. His personal name was originally spelled Mitsuteru (光照), with the same pronunciation. His works include Tetsujin 28, Giant Robo, Akakage, Babel II, Sally the Witch, Princess Comet, many adaptations of the Chinese classics Water Margin, Romance of the Three Kingdoms and The Records of The Grand Historian and manga biographies based on historical figures like Oda Nobunaga and Genghis Khan.
